companyInfo.name: WBES Engineering Solutions
companyInfo.address: Building 15, Dubai Industrial City, Dubai, UAE

introductionText: We are pleased to submit our quotation for the HVAC installation works as per your enquiry dated 10th January 2024. This offer is based on the scope of work and specifications provided.

scopeOfWork.description: Supply and installation of central air conditioning units (15 TR capacity)
Ductwork installation including supply and return ducts
Electrical wiring and control panel installation
Testing and commissioning of all HVAC systems

items.description: Supply and installation of central air conditioning units (15 TR capacity)
Ductwork installation including supply and return ducts
Electrical wiring and control panel installation
Testing and commissioning of all HVAC systems

ourViewpoints: We assure you of our commitment to quality workmanship and timely completion. All materials used will be of international standards and certified. Our team of experienced engineers will ensure proper installation and testing.
exclusions: Permits and approvals from local authorities
Material procurement delays beyond our control

deliveryCompletionWarrantyValidity.deliveryTimeline: 8 weeks from date of contract signing
